text: Blue's Clues & You! is an American educational television series for children, developed by Angela C. Santomero, a revival of the 1996â€“2006 Blue's Clues television series, Josh Dela Cruz is the host of the series, produced by 9 Story Media Group and Brown Bag Films. The first broadcast was on Nickelodeon and Treehouse TV on November 11, 2019.
